group.name: Alteran Stargate Network
group.shortDescription: Your next virtual odyssey awaits - Est. 2007.
group.longDescription: The Alteran Stargate Network is a long-running, fan-built Stargate teleportation system. Fully launched in 2008 (with roots going back to 2005), ASN connects hundreds of regions across the grid with fully functional, scripted gates that let residents rez, register, and instantly travel. Owners can also take advantage of its web-based management.

group.name: Novum Network
group.shortDescription: A new Gate network trying to improve visual fidelity founded in 2023.
group.longDescription: Novum Network brings together visionaries from across the digital landscape to collaborate on experimental design and community-driven projects. They set new standards for virtual identity through visual storytelling and avant-garde design patterns.

group.name: Hexem's House of Gadgets
group.shortDescription: Gadgets and Devices that work like magic.
group.longDescription: Hexemâ€™s House of Gadgets is your go-to source for useful tech devices, scripts, and streamlined communication resources. We offer a mix of ready-to-use gadgets and bespoke custom scripting services to solve any technical challenge. Discover how our tools and professional collaborations can elevate your virtual lifestyle today.

group.name: Vk Labs
group.shortDescription: Advanced interactive systems, Stargate devices and RP ready builds.
group.longDescription: Vk Labs specializes in creating devices to fit all your Stargate needs from DHDs to advanced computers helping you manage your Stargate accesses. They also provide builds that you can either use for your own as your homebase or for roleplaying.

group.name: OS Labs
group.shortDescription: The OG Stargate creator that inspired a lot.
group.longDescription: OS Labs was the source of many great products back in Eternal Calm. They provide quality devices and flyable ships. Development has halted but their products are still amongst the favorites.

group.name: Stargate Multiverse
group.shortDescription: One sim connecting the Gate networks and fans.
group.longDescription: The Stargate Multiverse Project or SGMU for short, is a collaborative Roleplay initiative on Second Life. Dedicated to recreating the awe and wonder of the Stargate franchise within a multi-sim virtual environment. Join us as we step through the event horizon into a galaxy of intrigue, diplomacy, and discovery.

group.name: Torvaldsland 2
group.shortDescription: Pure chaos sim with friendly aliens and shenanigans.
group.longDescription: Discover a place full of wonders and buildings to visit, take a car for a spin in this interactive and friendly homeworld of AFKEA and more.
